title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

components.name: N-methyl-N-propylmorpholinium N-acetyl-L-valinate
sample: 99.5 mass %;0.26 water mass %;0.057 halide impurity mass %(crystallization from solution;dried by vacuum heating)

ref.full: Marcinkowski, L.; Szepinski, E.; Milewska, M. J.; Kloskowski, A. (2019) J. Mol. Liq. 284, 557-568.
ref.title: Density, sound velocity, viscosity, and refractive index of new morpholinium ionic liquids with amino acid-based anions: Effect of temperature, alkyl chain length, and anion
